channel.title: CVE Feed for Accellion -- all

item.title: CVE-2019-5623|2024-08-04T20:01:51.319Z -- accellion -- file%20transfer%20appliance
item.description: Accellion File Transfer Appliance version FTA_8_0_540 suffers from an instance of CWE-77: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection').

item.title: CVE-2019-5622|2024-08-04T20:01:51.539Z -- accellion -- file%20transfer%20appliance
item.description: Accellion File Transfer Appliance version FTA_8_0_540 suffers from an instance of CWE-798: Use of Hard-coded Credentials.
